name: Faithshipping Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's (Yusei x Aki)
description:
A theme for the ever-so-popular Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's shipping, Faithshipping. I will admit I'm not one who sips this myself but I know a lot of people in the 5D's fandom do so here you all go! I didn't want to make it too complex and have a lot going on or it would take away the value of the ship. 
I hope anyone who uses it likes it! 
CSS --> http://userstyles.org/styles/72070/yubel-judai-tumblr-theme 
Picture --> http://www.zerochan.net/599066
additional_info:
Same applies as my first one in this case. 
This theme automatically applies itself to every site. For Chrome users, if you want to changed this and make it only apply to tumblr open the stylish icon on the chrome taskbar, click edit. From there it'll give you the code and an 'applies to' area. Click specify, change to 'URLs starting with' and put http://www.tumblr.com/do the same again but make it https://www.tumblr.com/ this way it will also apply when it's at the log in page 
You can make this apply to other sites if you want. 
For firfox users, I would like to think you would go about this in a similar method if you didn't want this all over your internet
